paragraphs.body: Changing the profile image (the image in the article's infobox, or the top image to the right of the introduction to a large majority of articles) is one of the most common proposed changes to articles on Avatar Wiki. Due to the regularity with which profile image changes are suggested, Avatar Wiki centralizes these changes on this page.
paragraphs.text: Changing the profile image (the image in the article's infobox, or the top image to the right of the introduction to a large majority of articles) is one of the most common proposed changes to articles on Avatar Wiki. Due to the regularity with which profile image changes are suggested, Avatar Wiki centralizes these changes on this page.

paragraphs.body: I think when possible, we should use an image that is in color over a black and white photo— it helps to better represent the figure in question, which is the purpose of a profile image. The proposal is a professional shot without a distracting background like the current, but is also in color. Fire  Ferret 04:58, November 25, 2018 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I think when possible, we should use an image that is in color over a black and white photo— it helps to better represent the figure in question, which is the purpose of a profile image. The proposal is a professional shot without a distracting background like the current, but is also in color. Fire  Ferret 04:58, November 25, 2018 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: The current is tiny, has lighting that distorts the color of his face, and is overall low quality. The proposal fixes these issues. Fire  Ferret 04:39, November 25, 2018 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: The current is tiny, has lighting that distorts the color of his face, and is overall low quality. The proposal fixes these issues. Fire  Ferret 04:39, November 25, 2018 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I'm not satisfied with the proposal and the current has the advantage of her head facing the camera, that being said the lighting is terrible and honestly is kind of... scary? I encourage anybody else to search for better images but this was the best I could find— it's high quality and has much nicer lighting than the current image. Fire  Ferret 04:22, November 25, 2018 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: The arms to his head are quite distracting in the current shot, both proposal fix that issue. My preference goes to proposal #1 as it is the most neutral shot while still showing his anxious attitude. #2 places more emphasis on that anxiousness in case that was preferred. Lady Lostris vstf (talk • HotN) 19:02, November 3, 2018 (UTC)
